visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts 3D scatter chart with the following specifications: The chart type should be 'scatter3d'. The chart title should be 'A 3D Scatter Chart' with a subtitle 'With grid lines and tick marks on the Z-Axis'. The axes should have specific styling: the X and Y axes should range from 0 to 10, with grid lines on the X-axis. The Z-axis should have custom tick settings and grid line styling. The data series should include a single series with 3D scatter points. The chart should have a 3D frame with a bottom frame of a specific color and opacity.

subtitle.text: With grid lines and tick marks on the Z-Axis

visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts configuration is designed to render a 3D scatter chart with specific visual and functional attributes. The chart type is set to 'scatter3d', enabling a three-dimensional representation of data points. The chart includes a title and subtitle to provide context. The axes are configured with specific ranges and styles: the X and Y axes range from 0 to 10, with grid lines on the X-axis, while the Z-axis has custom tick settings and grid line styling to enhance readability. The data series contains a single set of 3D scatter points, each defined by its X, Y, and Z coordinates. Additionally, the chart includes a 3D frame with a bottom frame of a specific color and opacity, adding depth and visual appeal to the chart.
